Reamaze | San Jose, CA | Full-Time & Interns | ONSITE

Reamaze (https://www.reamaze.com) makes simple helpdesk for modern businesses. We're located in the South Bay (San Jose, CA) and looking to hire for Ruby/Rails and Node/JS experience. Our interview process emphasizes coding as a pair on real practical problems with real code. We're looking for devs who place an emphasis on communicating directly with customers and owning parts of the feature roadmap. That means experience shipping working production code is required.

Contact in profile or a (slightly out of date) page here: http://blog.reamaze.com/jobs/
